name: BowFlex SelectTech 840 Adjustable Kettlebell

SPACE EFFICIENT: Replaces up to 6 kettlebell with weights at 8, 12, 20, 25, 35, and 40 lbs.

JRNY MOBILE-ONLY MEMBERSHIP: Workout at home or on the go with inspiring trainers, and just-for-you adaptive workouts, from your phone or tablet.
WIDE WEIGHT RANGE: Offers a variety of workouts, including swings, rows, squats, twists and more.
SPACE-SAVING DESIGN: Ensures a quality workout from nearly any room in your home.
product_description: Swing into action with the Bowflex SelectTech 840 Kettlebell, the adjustable kettlebell that provides 6 different weights in one compact design! Save space by selecting the weight you want with the turn of a dial, allowing you to achieve total-body results from the comfort of home. Our JRNY Mobile-Only Membership with Motion Tracking is ideal for strength training at home or on the go; try it free for 2 months from your phone or tablet. With the 840 Kettlebell, you'll combine cardio and strength in one quick, effective workout, helping you build muscle, burn fat, and boost confidence. *JRNY subscription required. This offer’s availability is subject to change without notice. At end of free trial, JRNY membership automatically renews at membership rates until canceled.

short_description: 【2-in-1 Convertible】This multi-functional kettlebell can also be converted into a weight adjustable dumbbell due to its innovative design. With just a Nimsqury adjustable kettlebell set, you can experience both kettle bell and dumbbell training!

【Patented Locking System】Unlike the upper and lower weight adjustment on the market, our kettlebells utilize a unique left and right side weight adjustment system that effectively eliminates the risk of sliding weight plates.

【Multiple Weights Available】The kettlebell sets offer more than 20 adjustable weights from 15lb to 45lb. When converted into a dumbbell, it provides a range from 4.8lb to 30lb with different combinations of weight plates. You can add weights according to your fitness level!

【Quick & Easy Adjustment】Adjusting your strength training kettlebells is simple. Just press the two buttons on the weight plate simultaneously and turn left to reduce weight. To increase the weight, turn the weight plate to the right until it locks into place.

【Various Exercise Methods】Kettle bells weights set is an ideal choice for agility training, weight training, cardio, squats, and more. Its compact and space-saving 2-in-1 design makes men kettle bells suitable for a variety of scenarios: home, office, or gym.

name: Adjustable Kettlebell | 5 lb - 12 lb | Kettlebell Weights Set for Home Gym | Full-Body Workouts, Strength Training, Weight Loss | Fabric Booty Band | Beginners & Women
short_description: 【Fitness Combo】Elevate your home workouts with our premium adjustable kettlebell and medium resistance booty band set. Designed for versatility, this combo caters to a wide range of exercises and fitness levels from beginners to professionals, making it the ideal choice for everyone from beginners to seasoned athletes.

【Adjustable Weight】Tailor your training intensity with our adjustable kettlebell, which shifts effortlessly between 5, 8, and 12 lbs. This feature allows you to progress as your strength improves, making it perfect for dynamic exercises like kettlebell swings, squats, and more.

【Resistance Booty Band】Sculpt and strengthen your lower body with our specially designed medium resistance booty band. This essential tool targets your hips, thighs, and glutes, enhancing your workout routine and helping you achieve that toned and lifted look.

【Ergonomic Design】Our kettlebell boasts a wide, ergonomically shaped handle that provides a comfortable, secure grip for both single and double-handed exercises. This thoughtful design minimizes fatigue and maximizes control, allowing you to extend your workout sessions.

【Built to Last】Both the adjustable kettlebell and the booty band are crafted from high-quality, durable materials meant to endure the toughest workouts. Whether you're at home or on the go, these robust fitness tools are built to withstand continuous use and provide consistent performance.

【Space Efficient】Ideal for those with limited workout space, our compact and lightweight set can be easily tucked away after your workout. Its portability makes it simple to transform any area into your personal fitness zone.

【Seamless Transitions】Experience the convenience of quickly adjusting the kettlebell’s weight with a simple twist and lock mechanism. Meanwhile, the booty band can be smoothly integrated into various exercises without hassle, keeping your workout pace uninterrupted.

【Ideal Gift】Looking for a thoughtful and practical gift? Our adjustable kettlebell and booty band set is a fantastic choice for fitness enthusiasts of all levels. It's not only functional but also stylishly designed, making it a great addition to any fitness collection.

【Comprehensive Workout Guide】Kickstart your fitness journey with our inclusive workout guide packed with detailed exercises specifically tailored for the kettlebell and booty band. Whether you’re aiming to boost strength, increase flexibility, or burn calories, this guide helps you get the most out of every session.

【Easy to Use】 This adjustable 3-in-1 kettlebell is incredibly user-friendly. To adjust the weight to match your workout intensity, simply press down on the spring clasp and give it a counter-clockwise twist. You can seamlessly switch between 12 pounds, 8 pounds, and 5 pounds, tailoring the resistance to suit your exercise needs.
